website_summaries.verdict: Excellent value for a quality leash. Comes in four sizes (5-10 feet) and four colors.
pros: Tested in big waves with no issues
Surfers love the double swivels and rail saver
cons: Some complaints of snapping after only a few sessions

customer_reviews.title: It's junk. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: It's not bullet proof. It's not even surf proof. I had this for all of three sessions before it snapped. I'm not hard on my gear. I'm a beginner. I surf a KookStorm foamie in small waves. The leash that came with the CostcoSpecial didn't break, it just gets twisted. This was supposed to be a step up from that 'cause it swivels. It did that for the first couple sessions, then one good wave and I'm swimming back to shore to get my board. And of course it broke a few days after the return window. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Snapped 5 days after the return window - seller was responsive and stood behind their guarantee
customer_reviews.text: Update to what happened below: Seller stood behind their guarantee and fixed the problem very quickly. Original issue: The main cord snapped when my 120lb son used it on his paddle board on a pretty calm day at the beach. Of course the failure happened 5 days after the return window. I'm surprised at how poorly this held up given the reviews. My Dakine leash is several years old, yellowed from the sun, and still holds my almost 200lbs without issue.
customer_reviews.author: ACC

customer_reviews.title: Low quality velcro and fabric, otherwise ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The leash is fine and so is the hardware. The velcro and fabric is very low quality - I just bought mine a couple of months back and it looks like it's ten years old. Good to see the seller is interested in helping out with issues. It would be nice if the manufacturer used better materials since the rest of the leash is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not the most durable, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This leash worked well for about 25-30 sessions. I just ride a Wavestorm 8ft board so I got an 8ft leash. The velcro and strap part were great. But then one day I was riding the tiniest waves I’ve ever been on, literally like half a foot, and the board just tugged once in a wave and the swivel part just snapped off from where it connected to the strap. Was really hoping it would last me longer. I enjoyed it for the few months I had it but not the most durable. The company graciously reaching out and offered me a replacement or refund for the leash which I was very happy about. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Benetz

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to pick up a no-name brand surf leash, but the lifetime warranty talked me into it. I have now used it on a five-week surf trip in Indo, and I'm totally sold on it. It held up to some pretty heavy surf and still feels very solid. UPDATE: the leash has now snapped at the cord (fastest I've ever broken a leash), and the lifetime warranty apparently no longer exists. BOTTOM LINE: probably a good buy if you aren't a serious surfer. Otherwise, spend the extra money to get a better product from a company like Dakine or FCS.
customer_reviews.author: mikesfishnchips

customer_reviews.title: Extra foot of leash
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 9' x 8mm for a SUP, actual length of leash is 10'. I dont want an extra foot of leash so this one will be returned. Otherwise this is my 12th leash BPS leash. Of you are prone to ditching your surf board in big waves, you can expect these to break at the ankle-side swivel attachment. Ive had 3 of them break there. Can't beat price though!
customer_reviews.author: colemanc

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Took about 5 sessions to not hurt like a mother f’er evertime the leash was pulled on. Only lasted about 20 sessions after that before it broke (plastic anti wind up mechanism broke) and tossed my board on the rocks unfortunately. Get what you pay for I guess. I’ll be using a dakine leash from now on, worth the extra few dollars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Troy C.

customer_reviews.title: Weak (possibly faulty) Leash, but good customer service)
customer_reviews.text: The swivel snapped after 2 months of use in 4-6’ waves at La Jolla shores (a location not even known for especially punchy waves). I was on my 6’ 4” fish, ate it on a cutback, and the wave came down, dragging my board towards shore which eventually snapped the swivel mechanism. These were NOT powerful conditions that it broke in... It was unrepairable and I threw it away at the beach. It worked as intended the first two months with only one unattachement of the velcro before. Update: the company responded promptly and are now looking into what seems to have been a faulty leash. They’ve issued a full refund. Good customer service and responsiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Great quality! Worked perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I make sharks tooth sifters and wanted to try this product out on one I just made and these had great reviews. So far this has worked to perfection and the build quality is exactly what I was hoping for as I will be buying these leases again for future projects because they put out a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good on small days
customer_reviews.text: Leash works great on headhigh and below days. Took my 7' BPS leash on a double overhead day, two days in a row and on both days the velcro came off the leash string. Had to bodysurf/ get annihilated in huge waves in order to swim and get my board :(
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your trash wavestorm leash
customer_reviews.text: And use this instead. Double swivels mean you won't get tangled up in the leash, and the cuff is much more comfortable. Also that amazing price. While you're at it, get a perfect storm fin too.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Surfing Leash
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or forth BPS storm surf leash I purchased. I use and switch to a new one every year to feel comfortable. I’ve had no problem, the price sensible, and will probably continue.
customer_reviews.author: aloha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid leash
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid leash. I like the amount of Velcro used not only to attach to the board, but also to my leg. I am using this for a surfboard (10 ft, fairly heavy longboard) not SUP so both are important.
customer_reviews.author: C. Costales

customer_reviews.title: Bad ankle attachment design.
customer_reviews.text: Faulty design. Broke both leashes at the same spot. See photos. Used 8mm for my SUP. Both times broke leashes in a semi-heavy beach break, when my board got ripped out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: L&A

customer_reviews.title: Durability is not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I used this leash maybe 15 or 20 times before the plastic swivel snapped. It happened in tiny surf as well. I've never had leash break prior to this. Based off of the reviews, this seems to be happening to quite a few other people. Leashes normally last for years, so I'd recommend shelling out a little extra money for a better one, especially if you surf in rocky areas where your board can get damaged if your leash breaks.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Leash snapped in less than a week; however, the customer service was awesome, got right back to me, and I had a new leash on my board in 48 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Randy K.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Leash worked perfect for my 8 year olds board. No kinking and it held strong through his tumbles off the board and dragging the board by the leash in the surf. He has used it 10+ days so far. I would recommend this product based on speed of delivery and price. The costumer service is also exceptional!! They contacted me at purchase and again at receipt to ensure the order went through smoothly and the product was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: SweetMelissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a leash. Why pay 40$ for a name brand leash that’s the same material and construction as this one? This works great and is comfortable on the ankle. The Velcro holds up well! This is the second one I’ve bought for an additional board I just ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Etkai

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash. It’s very soft on the skin. You won’t even feel it pulling on you and I wear it without a wetsuit with an 8 foot surf board.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: As good as any big name brand leashed I ever used in my 30+ years of surfing...and way cheaper. Great quality, great customer support and super fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: onza

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a great product. Looks solid
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a great product. Looks solid, well constructed & a great price compared to some of the bigger names. Love the customer service with the owner/founder following up immediately to make sure I'm happy. I remember when amazon did the same thing in the early days & knew they'd be a great co one day. 45 years of surfing around the world in the best known spots...will see how this baby holds up & will report back in a few months but so far very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used my new surf leash yesterday. Waves were overhead in size. Leash is well made, seems very durable. I am very satisfied with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Both boys said the material was comfortable and they enjoyed their surfing experience with these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the 6 ft. surfboard leashes for my boys (6 and 7 years old). I was worried the cuffs might be too big since it's not really marketed towards kids, but was surprised that they adjusted enough to fit perfectly. Both boys said the material was comfortable and they enjoyed their surfing experience with these. I would buy another from this company.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyMae18

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this leash
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this leash. Used it in some very big surf in Nicaragua with no issues. It is excellent and considering how inexpensive pretty a great deal! We took these leashes to the North Shore and they were well tested, and did excellent, in overhead to 2x overhead waves.
customer_reviews.author: daner

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - even in small waves
customer_reviews.text: Leash broke at the ankle piece in under 2 months of small Florida waves. Edit: The seller reached out to me via email and let me know that I was automatically refunded for the purchase. Review upgraded to three stars for the initial quality of the product before breaking and for the refund policy in place.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lindenberg

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed in Leash Construction and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Leash was just sitting around waiting for its turn. I used it less than 6 times and yesterday on a 3 foot wave it broke. (see Photo) . I have NEVER had a leash break in that location (40+ years surfing) which has me questioning the materials used
customer_reviews.author: Woodsy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: As I haven’t had the chance to actually use the lease yet being landlocked at the moment, I can only go by the visual inspection and it looks like a good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: While I have not yet had the time to test this on the surf, the materials used are top of the line and I suspect this product will hold up for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for our sups. They are nicer than some of the Surf Shop ones, with the swivel cord and easy grab Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K

customer_reviews.title: Snapped after 3 months but got a refund.
customer_reviews.text: They claim the swivels are stainless still, but mine were pretty rusty after just 3 months. I snapped it today in 3ft at 5 sec, which shouldn't happen. Swivel broke straight off of the collar. Update: The company did refund my order for snapping so early. Hopefully I just got the one-off.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I've used this leash on my shortboard on 10ft + ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this leash on my shortboard on 10ft + days and it held together even through the biggest sets.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisg

customer_reviews.title: Received the surf strap promptly and it was what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the surf strap promptly and it was what I had hoped it would be. I am going to use as a saftey line for my Hobie Mirage Tandem Islander. In fact I am going to buy a second one for the other seat. Instead of a foot leash it will be an arm leash (in case I go over I will be tethered.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Twoof Everything

customer_reviews.title: Surf leash.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Seems to be holding up to the elements and use
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Martin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, Was kind of surprised to get sent a user's manual from the company. If you need a user's manual to operate a surf leash, there may be bigger issues
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nosek

customer_reviews.title: They Suck!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and it was broken straight out of the package. Connection to surfboard is completely missing!! W.T.F.? B.P.S. (beanbag unsurf proof products!!!) DON'T BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrjs

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, arrived early. Exactly as described. Perfect length for my daughter’s foam board.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this leash before (the 6 foot length) for my short board and found it to be excellent. I had a "brand name" leash that broke when I flubbed a duckdive, and my board surfed itself into the rocks (it was an 8 foot foamie, so no big deal). I am replacing it an 8 foot length Bullet Proof. I've also purchased their foam deck and tail traction pads and found them to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee Gee

customer_reviews.title: Quality and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, good looking leash and comfy for paddle boarding. The reason I pick these because of the colors u can choose from I like to be visible while on the water, black is too common and boring. Why not add some colors right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice key pocket
customer_reviews.text: Leash came right away. Nice key pocket. I have a small ankle and this leash fits just fine! I have yet to use the product but will return with comments when I do.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN

customer_reviews.title: Solid leash - so far so good with SUP in surf
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for a leash that has done well in some decent sized surf with a 10'6" SUP board - fairly heavy, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: MarkInCalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash on the Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great leash at a good price. Ive never surfed it in anything much overhead, but it doesnt give me anything to worry about now.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Surfboards, SUPs, and Kayaks
customer_reviews.text: Great leash! The cord and velcro strap are sturdy/made with good material. I’ll actually be using this on my sit on top Ocean Kayak, so the 6ft length ended up being perfect. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Why is this product no dominating the market? This is a fantastic leash and rivals some of the more expensive brands on the market. Such solid construction and the leash is very comfortable. Great value and cannot look past the quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Travlin Ray

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY, LOWEST PRICE LEASH OUT THERE!
customer_reviews.text: High Quality Leash for my5'0 SurfBoard! I checked out the Surf shops and they only have single swivel leashes at high prices of $25 and higher. This was only $13 and has a double swivel. The ankle wrap is solid and the overall Leash is the highest quality! Way better than the Surf Shops!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Costanza

customer_reviews.title: So far no issues.
customer_reviews.text: So far there has been no issue. Leash seems high quality. I've only been using it for a couple of weeks on my 9' 4" longboard. Only time will tell if and when it breaks. Arrived on time and in new condition. Wish there was more color option but since there is none, black is the preferred color if there is just one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Yee Haw,  Fins Down, Get Salty !!
customer_reviews.text: Really a SWEET Leash!! NO WORRIES about Breakage, swivels hanging up or anything bad & I wipeout way more than Most Folks !! Doc Watson
customer_reviews.author: DOC Watson Custom Surfboards

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement leash.
customer_reviews.text: This leash is really good quality. I've bought this leash after the leash broke on my brother's long board that I'm currently borrowing to learn how to surf with. This leash has really taken some good snags and hasn't broke. I like how it swivels on both ends of the leash and the key pocket comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: V. Dacoron

customer_reviews.title: Good short leash doesn't hang off my SUP as much!
customer_reviews.text: My last leash snapped and I've been using 8 and 10 foot leashes since. This short leash barely hangs off the back of my board and causes little drag which makes catching waves that much easier. The cuff is comfortable and secure even in some gnarly getoffs!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSUCKS

customer_reviews.title: I know some may have already thought of this, ...
customer_reviews.text: I know some may have already thought of this, but I bought this for my long(skate)boar. Being in San Fran my biggest fear is my board getting away from me, luckily I found a spot for the versatile velcro buckle to hook around.
customer_reviews.author: Micah James Zayner

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Proof surfboard leash.
customer_reviews.text: The surf leash looks well made and delivery was fast and efficient to Hawaii. We'll see if it can take the rigors of North Shore surf this winter. Leash broke at the Velcro, had to swim 1/2 mile. I have owned 5 BPS leashes first one to break.
customer_reviews.author: John Galera

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a beginner surfer. This leash was a perfect fit for the board he received for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Mom904

customer_reviews.title: Three stars
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is not so good, a little not so like!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beeney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my nephew who surfs year-round, told me it was an excellent leash
customer_reviews.author: Happy Days are here again

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My leash arrived on time and exactly as described. I haven't had a chance to try it in the water yet but looking forward to using it on my wavestorm. This is a must have replacement for the box leash that came with the wavestorm.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as advertised, I'll give it a workout and see if it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: Well made leash
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Haven't lost a leash. Very secure and well made. Using in waves 4-5 feet for us old dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's a 5 start product. It's wll put together and the have a sea worthy quality. It should save me many hours for surfing instead of chasing my board up and down the beach. I notice that Amazon has a better price than the surf shops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: High quality leash for a fraction of the price that you'd get on the top brand names in surf shops. Always good to have an extra one of these bad-boys in my bag just in case. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Surfer77

customer_reviews.title: A great Leash
customer_reviews.text: Family Surfboards approves this purchase. A great leash at an affordable price. Thanks Phillip Hurst Family Surfboards LLC
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hurst

customer_reviews.title: great leash
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a leash that didn't cost to much but can take a big waves pull. I got 10 of them for the kids in Nicaragua church group. It's a donation and I'm happy on this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Benaguide63

customer_reviews.title: Record short life of any leash I've owned! 😱
customer_reviews.text: Inner cord broke on 2nd wave. Had to come in, reef surfing. Ouch. Not of the quality I expected with the high ratings. Back to C of L.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: They held up.
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Indonesia...and they held up. Three weeks of relentless surf. Don't really have to say much else.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Pedreros

customer_reviews.title: Leash Broke in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Used this leash for 3 months. Metal swivel broke (looks like it rusted) and board went sailing into shore.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not for big surf
customer_reviews.text: Okay for small surf, good price, would not recommend for surf over chest high
customer_reviews.author: christine smotrys

customer_reviews.title: Board Connection
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been out in the surf yet but the leash looks well built and it was an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Nice leash
customer_reviews.text: Well made with additional attention to the rail saver area. Definitely would buy again. Reasonable price a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This leash for SUPing is right on. I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This leash for SUPing is right on. I didn't want a coiled leash and this one fits the bill perfectly. The cuff is very soft and secure. Bought one for each board.
customer_reviews.author: Phile425

customer_reviews.title: Good leash and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I received the leash in a day or so. It was as advertised. Haven't used it yet but bulletproof is a good brand and is great quality. I'll update this review of the leash has issues...from past experience I doubt it will.
customer_reviews.author: S Khoury

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent delivery time!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and delivery time was super fast!!! I'm very happy with this purchase. Everything was as shown and of good quality. Will buy again from this vendor. Recommend to any one who needs surf products.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Obando V

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any problems of it stretching as I have read on some posts here. I ordered the 6' leash. It does what it's supposed to do. Comfortable and secure. I forget I even have it on.
customer_reviews.author: ZenLife

customer_reviews.title: Snapped
customer_reviews.text: This surf leash looked durable enough, but on the third day out in waist high surf this cord snapped and my board went a long way to shore. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kathi

customer_reviews.title: An EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very Well Constructed! Lot's of Padding at the Ankle! The company owner even emailed, exhibiting True Personal Service! Thanks Blair!
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best bang for your buck I've seen when it comes to leashes.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Great leash! 2nd time buying this product and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great leash! 2nd time buying this product and it works great. First one broke after a little over a year, but as expected because I surfed twice a week and didn't duckdive with my 6'2 soft top.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great leash.
customer_reviews.text: Used my new leash today and it is flawless. Nice wide ankle strap for comfort and velcro connection to surfboard for easy installation and removal from board. Great product and price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Les Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service first rate! Seems like a rock solid leash. I will be using it later this month. If it doesn't meet my expectations I will post an update. So if you don't see an update, the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kempers Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leash.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leash. Have purchased BPS Storm leashes in the past. Always satisfied with performance and comfort. Quick delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Gevurtz

customer_reviews.title: great leash even if it was higher priced
customer_reviews.text: Got the leash yesterday and had head high messy conditions to give it a go today (plenty of white water to test it's strength). The ankle wrap was comfortable, the rail saver is the wide style (which I prefer for more tail/rail protection), the swivels are stainless as advertised and the overall build quality was equal to/maybe better than my previous Pro-lite and FCS leashes. You can't beat the price and I definitely recommend this leash, I will most certainly buy another for backup.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice leash.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. I haven't gotten a chance to take the board I put it on out yet.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner boards or a fish
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginner boards or a fish, but heavy for a shortboard. Also seem to stretch quick. Mine is way longer than 6 feet after only 2 sessions. But if you need a cheap leash for some summertime small wave boards it is a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Baptiste Buchler

customer_reviews.title: Quality 5 star, functionality to be determined
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this product. We purchased two SUP boards that did not come with a leash. Will not be able to assess the leash functionality until this summer, as our lake is frozen over.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery - quality product
customer_reviews.text: Really liked that this product is high quality, great price and has instructions to make sure installed properly. Thanks for great service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as described. Well packed and promptly shipped. ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Well packed and promptly shipped. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: William Demers

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: this works well. i already have one and bought another one for my other SUP. very firm fit and have had no problems so far in surf, though i paddle in surf less so has not received big test for long.
customer_reviews.author: N. D. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Get buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my leash as promised on time and in perfect condition! It’s a gift & will be loved when opened! Will definitely order again in future!
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: and looks just as great as it was described in the ad
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time, and looks just as great as it was described in the ad. I have not used the leash, hence - can't comment on the comfort and durability. Visually, it looks great (just like my many previous leashes) so I anticipate no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Murad Khalliev

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a very specific leash (colour, size, etc.) and quick: I got the exact product I check on line and only 3 days after ordering it --> congrats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comparable and often better than more well-known brands.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with great customer service to match. My surf-obsessed teenage son is very happy with his leash.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the quick reply and shipping. Nice product, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Munce

customer_reviews.title: Quality leashes and price is right.
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my longboard and I liked it so when my funshape leash broke, I got one for it. Durable and comfortable. Price is right. Quality leash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy leash at a bargain price. The red color looks good with my board.
customer_reviews.author: Wendo

customer_reviews.title: Stoked!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lot more Heavy-duty than it did on-line, cool and since it comes with a lifetime warranty... Stoked!!! I'll take it out tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Masana671

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, on time. Used it already, exactly as described. This company is amazing! I contacted them after my leash broke almost a year after purchase, I use the leash around 3 times a week, and they refunded my order almost immediately. Excellent customer service, and great products. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great surf leashes at low cost
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these leashes that I have purchased. I think they are as good as any leashes on the market, but they are a lot less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Surfer23451

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Good leash. I don’t write reviews most of the time but trying to make an effort here. Works well, nice and strong
customer_reviews.author: Sairy Demesa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, comfortable, and does not rip in big waves.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Cello

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I would recommend this leash any day. It's holding up so far against east coast beach break waves on a 9.6 ft. long board.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Buy name brand not this
customer_reviews.text: Bought three. Two broke at strap on smaller days. Only used 5 times. Buy a name brand leash!
customer_reviews.author: Grant C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought one about 6 months ago and it works great and no signs of wear. So I bought another one. Great product and will probably buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gnomehobbit

customer_reviews.title: ... the body board model for a Morey Boogie and liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought the body board model for a Morey Boogie and liked it so much, I bought one for one of my longboards. It's quality made product that feels good on the ankle and at this price point, it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: J. MOELLER

product_meta.title: BPS 'Storm' 7.2mm and 8mm Surfboard and SUP Leash/Leg Rope - 5/6/7/8/9/10 Feet Premium Straight Leash with Double Stainless Steel Swivels and Triple Rail Saver (4 Colors)
feature_bullets: Grab yourself a specialist BPS Surf or SUP leash at an awesome price – get to select from 5 to 10 foot and colors of Black, Dark Blue, Red and Yellow. It has super comfortable embroidered collar and old school key pocket.

Surf and Snow Warehouse is the ONLY authorised seller of new authentic BPS products. Please check the seller (see “Sold by” above) before you purchase to ensure you are purchasing the authentic genuine product with the 'next-level guarantee'

Trialled, tested and thrashed by BPS to make sure it's got what it takes and is built to last with Max-strength double stainless swivels; choose between 7.2mm or (NEW!!) 8mm urethane cord; triple wrap rail saver and precision molded fittings. You will also be emailed an installation E-Guide with easy to follow pictures written by us showing you how to properly install your leash quick smart.

Buy with complete confidence – as all products from Surf and Snow Warehouse are stored and shipped (quickly and reliably) to you by Amazon in the US. All BPS products are 100% guaranteed - If it doesn't deliver what it is supposed to at anytime within 12 MONTHS of purchase, it will be replaced or you'll be refunded - your choice

Thank you for looking at a product from our store, Surf and Snow Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love -- water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100%. We are known for the great product support, advice and after-sales service we provide -- so if you have ANY questions about any of our products, please just ask.
